utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Someone mentioned that Chris would be joining us today.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Yes, I heard that too. Is that Chris Taylor or Chris Morgan?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: I'm not sure. The email wasn't very clear about which one.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Well, one of them should arrive soon. Let's wait and see.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: In the meantime, should we review the agenda?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Good idea. We have a lot to cover today regardless of who shows up.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Right. Let's make sure we're prepared for either scenario.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Agreed. The presentation needs to be finalized by end of day anyway.
